biotools.summary: Chlamydomonas Library Project (CLiP) provides access to a collection of mutant strains in the green alga Chlamydomonas reinhardtii, a powerful model system for studying a broad range of fundamental processes including the biology of chloroplasts, photosynthesis, cilia/flagella, eyespots, and algal lipid accumulation.

bioschemas.name: CLiP  Chlamydomonas
